artist: Artist: Kawase Hasui; Publisher: Kawaguchi Jirō
description: purple, burgundy and variegated irises against green grass; blue sky at top
inscription: bottom margin: 昭和四年七月作 {Shōwa yonen shichigatsu saku}
markings: LRC, red round artist\'s seal: 川セ {Kawase}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text:
On back: label 初版精撰、百拾の内、第九十一號、巴水 {shohan seisen, hyaku mai no uchi, dai kyūjūichi gō, Hasui} (from 100 carefully selected prints of the first edition, no. 91, Hasui) and red round stylized artist's seal; stamp: MADE IN JAPAN.
First edition.
title: Irises
